00063 class BSchemaDatabaseNode : public BIndexedDataNode, public BnReferable
00064 {
00065 public:
00066     // --------------------------------------------------------------
00070 
00071     typedef void (*database_missing_func)(const sptr<BSchemaDatabaseNode> &table);

00073                                     BSchemaDatabaseNode(const SContext& context,
